title: Feel Good Now: A Workbook Using EZDS: A Workbook Using EZDS
description: Feel Good Now: A Workbook Using EZDS takes you on a journey of releasing deep emotional trauma. Rather than make you dig up your past to clear it, I created a series of EZDS statements for you to use, taking you from the lowest to the highest negative emotions and replacing them with an opposite positive emotion. Some issues might take weeks or months to clear, so be patient.
author: Juniper Bartlett
